page.title: 16Lundy's only child.
page.content: Brent is the only child who now lives on the island.He is 4 years old. He enjoys watching television and playing with his toy tractor.His favourite place on the island is the South Light and he treasures a ship in a bottle made for him by George who is one of the lighthouse keepers. Brent is taught at home.There are advantages and disadvantages to being taught on his own.As there are no other children he can work quicker but he misses out on the activities and facilities of a school. He goes to the mainland to get toys and he has been twice in the last 6 months. Brent is not allowed to go off on his own,the farthest he has been with his mum is Tibbett's Lookout. {Ryan Leach.
